pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extensible Markov Model for Modelling Temporal Relationships Between Clusters // Implements TRACDS (Temporal Relationships between Clusters for Data Streams), a generalization of Extensible Markov Model (EMM). TRACDS adds a temporal or order model to data stream clustering by superimposing a dynamically adapting Markov Chain. Also provides an implementation of EMM (TRACDS on top of tNN data stream clustering). Development of this package was supported in part by NSF IIS-0948893 and R21HG005912 from the National Human Genome Research Institute. Hahsler and Dunham (2010) doi:10.18637/jss.v035.i05.
